description: snoop: Network packet sniffer. SunOS equivalent of `tcpdump`. (Capture network packets that come from a hostname and go to a given port)

description: snoop: Network packet sniffer. SunOS equivalent of `tcpdump`. (Capture and show a hex-dump of network packets exchanged between two IP addresses)

title: truss - Start tracing a program by executing it, following all child processes
description: truss: Troubleshooting tool for tracing system calls. SunOS equivalent of strace. (Start tracing a program by executing it, following all child processes)

description: truss: Troubleshooting tool for tracing system calls. SunOS equivalent of strace. (Start tracing a specific process by its PID)

description: truss: Troubleshooting tool for tracing system calls. SunOS equivalent of strace. (Start tracing a program by executing it, showing arguments and environment variables)

description: truss: Troubleshooting tool for tracing system calls. SunOS equivalent of strace. (Count time, calls, and errors for each system call and report a summary on program exit)

title: truss - Trace a process filtering output by system call
description: truss: Troubleshooting tool for tracing system calls. SunOS equivalent of strace. (Trace a process filtering output by system call)
